commentList.commentContent: In the passage, the author states that most American wood companies will not adopt environmental friendly practices to produce ecocertified wood. However, the professor refutes it

In the passage, the author states that most American wood companies will not adopt environmental friendly practices to produce ecocertified wood. However, the professor refutes it, and points out its flaws respectively.
